name: Core API Release 36.10.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs, which brings you some new features. Please see below for details.

ADDED.text: We have introduced  APIs for a new feature: Duo Authenticator as a MFA integraion, which is currently enabled only via the backend.
New error codes 1330-1336 have been introduced with Duo Authenticator to enhance security and improve error handling.
New error code 1337 have been introduced as part of Apple Native Login APIs.
Two new APIs Access Token via Apple JWT ID Token and Access Token via Apple Refresh Token have been added to support Apple Native Login.
